title: Shuumatsu no Walküre (Record of Ragnarok)
synopsis: The gods of the world—from Greek to Norse to Hindu mythology—gather every one thousand years to make one important decision: whether or not to wipe out mankind. Repulsed by humanity's selfishness, the council unanimously votes to destroy all humans. But before the decree is enacted, Brunhilde, one of the 13 Valkyries of Valhalla, interrupts the meeting to give mankind a chance at survival.
related_anime: ['Shuumatsu no Walküre Mini Anime', 'Shuumatsu no Walküre 2nd Season', 'Shuumatsu no Walküre']
